com.github.rjbx.calibrater

Class Calibrater

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.rjbx.calibrater.Calibrater

  • public class Calibrater
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for adjusting and calibrating percentage arrays.

    • Method Detail

      • shiftRatings

        public static boolean shiftRatings(java.lang.Float[] percentages,
                                   java.lang.Integer adjustedIndex,
                                   java.lang.Float magnitude)
        Increments or decrements a Float array element by the specified magnitude while calibrating other Float array elements to maintain proportionality.
        Parameters:
        percentages - Float array elements to be adjusted if not proportionate
        adjustedIndex - index of the array element to be adjusted
        magnitude - amount of the adjustment; non-zero value should be no more than 1 or -1
        Returns:
        true if percentage was adjusted and false otherwise

      • resetRatings

        public static boolean resetRatings(java.lang.Float[] percentages,
                                   java.lang.Boolean forceReset)
        Reads Float array and assigns proportionate values to each Float array element.
        Parameters:
        percentages - Float array elements to be calibrated if not proportionate
        Returns:
        true if percentage was calibrated and false otherwise
